#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int P[505];
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        //memset(A,0,sizeof(A));
        memset(P,0,sizeof(P));
        int n,m,tot;
        cin>>n>>m;
        while(m--)
        {
            int x,y;
            cin>>x>>y;
            P[x]++;P[y]++;
            tot+=2;
        }
        sort(P+1,P+n+1);
        int A[n+1];
        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) A[i]=P[n+1-i];
        int f=0,x=0,y=0;
        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
            if(A[i]>=i-1)
                f=i;
        for(int i=1;i<=f;i++)
            x+=A[i];
        for(int i=f+1;i<=n;i++)
            y+=A[i];
        if(x==(f*(f-1))+y) cout<<"YES\n";
        else cout<<"NO\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
